post.author: jonathanm
post.title: Windows Communication Foundation
post.content: During the development of the Sphinx Logic site with Silverlight I ran into a road block. I could not use the namespace System.Net.Mail for security reasons. So what Mr. Guthrie suggested was that I use a web service. I thought I would use WCF. And with a little magic it was done. As I've told you before I'll make most of the site and API's Open Source. Just not yet. So now you can send email via Silverlight 2. Who knows I might post it in the Code Samples section on my next post.
